tool_description: An API that scrapes articles from news sources.
name: Climate Change Article Scraper
title: Climate Change Article Scraper

api_list.name: Get All News Sources
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all available sources (name and url).
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-article-scraper.p.rapidapi.com/news/sources"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-article-scraper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Climate Change News Articles
api_list.description: This end point will return all news articles containing "climate" from select news sites.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-article-scraper.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-article-scraper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Articles from Individual News Sites
api_list.description: This endpoint returns articles from a specific news source.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-article-scraper.p.rapidapi.com/news/bbc"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-article-scraper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-article-scraper.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newssiteid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-article-scraper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
